product_name: Life is good Crusher Sleeveless T-Shirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Life is good(R) Crusher T-Shirt is made of exceptionally soft cotton with a fresh pigment-dyed color, and features original outdoor-inspired graphics. "Crushing" process yields extra loft in fabric and doubles the softness. Life is good(R) Crusher T-Shirt features a scoop neck and relaxed fit. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Life is good(R) Crusher T-Shirt is made of exceptionally soft cotton with a fresh pigment-dyed color, and features original outdoor-inspired graphics.
